encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Let's see if you can break past the rock-hard willpower of my POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I took you for granted, and so I lost.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Let's see how far you can go.\pGood luck.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Only those TRAINERS who have a policy about POKéMON can turn pro.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Can you handle my all-out offensive of WATER-type POKéMON?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: There's plenty strong of TRAINERS still ahead of you.\pStay strong!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You won't live long in combat!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I tell you, kid, my electric POKéMON and me trust each other to the end!\pTrust your POKéMON, and they'll always have your back!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I must have dozed off. Welcome!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hope you're prepared.\nI do not plan on losing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I concede defeat.\nYou are remarkably strong.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I must say I'm impressed!\pBest of luck to you in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pA mere child like you dares to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Despair to the creeping horror of POISON-type POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have proven your worth!\pLet's just see how long you can last…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I had a vision of your arrival.\pI dislike battling, but if you wish…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will show you my powers!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: A loss is a loss.\pTread carefully, I see difficult battles in your future.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My fiery POKéMON are all rough and ready with intense heat!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better have a BURN HEAL!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I have burned down to nothing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Not even ashes remain!\pI like your style, kid!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pI shall bring glory TEAM ROCKET!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was a truly intense fight.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Your POKéMON will be at my mercy when they are frozen solid.\pHahaha!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're better than I though.\pGo on ahead.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Through rigorous training, people and POKéMON can become stronger without limit.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My POKéMON will grind you down with our superior power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My job is done.\pGo face your next challenge.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll show you how a real TRAINER battles!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I have nothing else to say.\pRun along now, child!
I hate to admit it, but you have bested me.\pI shall eagerly watch your path forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I am usually a man of research.\pBut at this moment in time…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I shall battle, with no mercy!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You were truely astounding, battling alongside your POKéMON.\pI wish you the best of luck moving forward!
